title: Direct Link on Classic (1.0) docs
introduction: The IBM Cloud Direct Link on Classic solution is designed to seamlessly connect your on-premises resources to your cloud resources.

section_recommended.title: Ordering Direct Link Connect on Classic
section_recommended.description: Fast setup! Leverage a service provider to quickly establish and deliver connectivity to IBM Cloud locations. Ideal for multi-cloud environments with your service provider's network.

section_recommended.title: Ordering Direct Link Dedicated on Classic
section_recommended.description: Terminate a single-tenant, fiber-based, cross content into your own IBM Cloud private network connection. Also used by colocation facilities adjacent to IBM Cloud PoPs and data centers.

section_recommended.title: Ordering Direct Link Dedicated Hosting on Classic
section_recommended.description: Provides connectivity similar to Direct Link Dedicated, but the connection point is next to an IBM Cloud data center, which improves latency for higher-performance use cases.

section_recommended.title: Ordering Direct Link Exchange on Classic
section_recommended.description: Use a colocation or data center provider that is already connected to the IBM Cloud network. Perfect for creating multi-cloud connectivity in a single environment.

tiles.title: How do I know which Direct Link solution to order?
tiles.description: Use this decision tree to help you decide which solution works best for you. Click the 'View more' link for details.
